When calibrating the time, first move all the pointers to the 12 o'clock position, then put the battery to adjust the correct time. If the pointer works inaccurate or has a pause, you need to disassemble it and reinstall it. Do not use too much force during installation to avoid damaging the pointer. Move all the hands to the 12 o'clock position, make sure the second hand and minute hand is kept parallel, then insert the battery and start adjusting the time from the back.
